Chip Support Library
IMPORTANT NOTE
The interfaces defined in this package are bound to change. Kindly treat the interfaces as work in progress. Release notes/user guide list the additional limitation/restriction of this module/interfaces. See also TI Disclaimer.

Chip Support Library(CSL) provides a no-OS platform support for multi-core SoCs. CSL provides CSL Functional Layer (CSL-FL) libraries and CSL Register Layer (CSL-R) along with peripheral/board level sample/demo examples that demonstrate the capabilities of the peripherals.

Also refer to top level user guide for detailed features, limitations and usage description.

The below listed is a superset of all the CSL-FL modules, for certain SDK release, it may include only a subset of these modules.

The CSL-FL includes the following modules/drivers

  • HW Type Defines (See HW Type Defines)
    In-line functions required to read/write values from/to the hardware registers
  • IP's
    • Video Module
      • DSS (See DSS CSL-FL)
    • System Module
      • EDMA (See EDMA)
      • EPWM (See EPWM)
      • GPIO (See GPIO)
      • Mailbox (See Mailbox)
      • MMU (See MMU)
      • Spinlock (See Spinlock)
      • Timer (See Timer)
      • WD Timer (See WD Timer)
    • Safety/Security Module
      • ADC (See ADC)
      • CRC (See CRC)
      • DCC (See DCC)
      • ESM (See ESM)
      • L4 Firewall (See L3 Firewall)
      • L4 Firewall (See L4 Firewall)
      • Tesoc (See Tesoc)
      • RTI (See RTI)
    • Serial Module
      • DCAN (See DCAN)
      • I2C (See I2C)
      • MCAN (See MCAN)
      • McSPI (See McSPI)
      • QSPI (See QSPI)
      • UART (See Uart)
      • PCIe (See PCIe)
    • Memory Controller
      • EMIF (See EMIF)
      • GPMC (See GPMC)
      • OCMC (See OCMC)
    • Memory/Storage
      • MMCSD (See MMCSD)
  • SOC Module
    This Module contain the SOC level configuration API's such as cross bar configuration, cross bar defines, SOC defines
    • Device Common API's (See Device Common API)
    • TDA2EX (See SOC_TDA2EX)
    • TDA2PX (See SOC_TDA2PX)
    • TDA2XX (See SOC_TDA2XX)
    • TDA3XX (See SOC_TDA3XX)
  • ARCH Module
    This Module contain the core specific configuration API's such as Interrupt, Cache, ECC
    • A15 (See A15)
    • A53 (See (ARM64 Genearl Functions))
    • R5 Core (See R5 API)
    • R5 CCM (See MCU ARMSS CCMR5 API)
    • R5 VIM (See VIM API)
    • DSP-C66x (See C66x)
    • M4 (See M4)
    • EVE (See ARP32)
